text: Pakistan ne e-commerce per 18% tax laga diya hai.  Yeh sab online sellers aur buyers ke liye bohat important hai.
Agar aap online sell ya buy karte hain, to aapko yeh tax dena hoga.  Prices badhne wali hain.
Payment gateways (banks, Easypaisa etc) aur courier companies tax collect karengi.
Daraz, Amazon, etc per sirf tax registered vendors hi sell kar sakte hain.
Agar tax nahin diya gaya to 5 lac se 1 million tak fine lag sakta hai.
